logging.label: Logging
logging.comment: Use for debugging only. Do not use on productive systems.

matnr.comment: SRM product number of the item
matnr.label: MATNR

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

value.label: Value
value.comment: Must be maintained as ISO code in the SRM Server. Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

priceunit.comment: Price unit of the item (if empty, 1 is used)
priceunit.label: PRICEUNIT

value.label: Value
value.comment: In whole numbers. Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

leadtime.comment: Delivery time of the item in days
leadtime.label: LEADTIME

value.label: Value
value.comment: In whole numbers. Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

vendor.comment: SRM vendor number (business partner) for the item
vendor.label: VENDOR

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

vendormat.comment: Vendor product number for the item
vendormat.label: VENDORMAT

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

manufactcode.comment: SRM manufacturer number of the item
manufactcode.label: MANUFACTCODE

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

matgroup.comment: SRM material group for the item
matgroup.label: MATGROUP

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

ext_product_id.comment: External product number for the item
ext_product_id.label: EXT_PRODUCT_ID

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

service.comment: Flag: the item is a service.
service.label: SERVICE

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

contract.comment: SRM contract to which the item refers
contract.label: CONTRACT

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

ext_quote_id.comment: Number of an external bid for this item (as reference for a subsequent purchase order)
ext_quote_id.label: EXT_QUOTE_ID

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

attachment.comment: URL of the attachment (the attachment must be accessible for downloading under this URL)
attachment.label: ATTACHMENT

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

attachment_title.comment: Title of the attachment (if this is empty the file name from the URL above is used)
attachment_title.label: ATTACHMENT_TITLE

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

attachment_purpose.comment: Purpose of the attachment. C corresponds here to configuration.
attachment_purpose.label: ATTACHMENT_PURPOSE

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

ext_schema_type.comment: Name of a schema via which it was imported in the SRM Server
ext_schema_type.label: EXT_SCHEMA_TYPE

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

ext_category_id.comment: Unique key for an external category from the schema above, independent of the version of the schema
ext_category_id.label: EXT_CATEGORY_ID

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

ext_category.comment: Unique key for an external category from the schema above, dependent on the version of the schema
ext_category.label: EXT_CATEGORY

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.

sld_sys_name.label: SLD_SYS_NAME

item_type.label: ITEM_TYPE

parent_id.comment: An integer field that defines what the parent of the current item is in the Hierarchy structure. This field will be blank for an item which does not have any parent. Introduced since SRM 7.0 onwards.
parent_id.label: PARENT_ID

value.label: Value
value.comment: Use 'product.attribute_name' for product attributes or 'customer.attribute_name' for customer attributes.
